head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RUSSELL, TERESA MARIE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RUSSELL, TERESA MARIE

block.p: RUSSELL-Teresa Marie. On July 20, 2000 of Scarsdale, NY. Died peacefully at age 94. Beloved wife of the late Sal Russell. Loving mother of Charles W. Russell and wife Colette, Sr. M. Felicitas Russell, RDC, Terry M. Russell. Cherished grandmother to Charles, Christopher, Nicole and Monique. Great grandmother to Charles and William Russell. Mass of Christian burial Monday, July 24, 2000 at 10:30AM, Chapel of the Religious of the Divine Compassion, 52 North Broadway, White Plains, NY. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers contributions to the Alzheimer's Foundation would be appreciated.
